author: Tim Honey
text:
Are there city managers or assistant city managers who would like to assist ICMA with a slum upgrading project in Uganda.  We are working with 5 pilot cities in Uganda (around 100,000 in population) and are looking to start an internet based mentoring program for the town clerks (city managers) involved in this project.
If you are interested, please send me an e-mail.  My name is Tim Honey, former city manager of Portland, Maine and Boulder, Colordo.  I am now doing mostly international consulting work in Africa.  My e-mail address is: timhoney@aol.com.  I am heading up this Uganda project for ICMA.
Thank you.
title: ICMA international internet mentoring in Uganda
